name: Attack on Titan - Weapon - Christmas
detailed_description:
Add a set containing a new blade, scabbard, and ODM gear to the Equipment Supply Station.
Add a little flavor to the battlefield by using a new weapon designed with a Christmas's motif.

*Weapon All Set which contains all 4 weapon sets will be released for a special price in December.

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.
